channel.title: Team recruitment
channel.description: ok im not the best coder in the world i still have a nice few troubles but thats besides the point. i want to make a server that brings back the meening of fun and awsomeness because most servers today have only a few things. i want to try and recreat what bullet made because people loved that. if you want to join post your name here with your skills and age( age realy doesnt matter you dont have to if u dont wanna) we will need a host. so if anyones willing to host without stealing our server then well go ahead. we will need a good source if anybody knows one because all the ones i have are crap. and we will need a dedicated team. if you make the team i will pm you (most likely you will unless we are full) but like they say "the more the maryer" ok im done and dont forget its for fun. we want to bring back good memories of mopar. ps: we will also need a server name

item.title: Team recruitment
item.dc:creator: @moerin moerin
item.description:
@moerin wrote:

like this

[center]_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/center][center]? I have decided to look for more staff for my server, URSERVERNAME
? I got this Idea off a post I just looked at a few minutes ago, and I will thank that mate in a PM soon! [/center]
[center]_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/center]
[center]Table Of Contents[/center]

[center]Forum Administrator Position
Server Hoster Position
Associate Coder[/center]

[center]_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[center]Forum Administrator Position[/center]

? Will you be a active member on my forums, inform someone if they are breaking rules, Post frequently, And be a model for the other players to follow? -

[b]? What experience do you have, having a Administrator Position on other forums? (Provide Link of Forums, and Your username if you can) -

? Will you advertise our forums, and bring more people into our community? -[/b]

[center]_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[center]Server Hoster Position[/center]

[b]? Will you keep the server online for 4 hours a day or more? -

? Will you set a prime example for the other players, and tell them if they are doing something wrong? -

? What experience do you have as being a Server Hoster?[/b]

[center]_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[center]Associate Coder[/center]

[b]? Do you have any experience with coding? (If so tell us what kind) -

? Do you know how what C++ is, (If so, tell us what you think it is) -

? What will you do to be a good coder for URSERVERNAME? -[/b]

[center]_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[center]Credits[/center]

90% me and Knight 10% for thinking this idea

[center]_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/center]

- Forum Administrators Accepted -

- Associate Coders Accepted -

- Server Hosters Accepted -

Read full topic

item.title: Team recruitment
item.dc:creator: @bera58 bera58
item.description:
@bera58 wrote:

ok im not the best coder in the world i still have a nice few troubles but thats besides the point.
i want to make a server that brings back the meening of fun and awsomeness because most servers today have only a few things. i want to try and recreat what bullet made because people loved that.
if you want to join post your name here with your skills and age( age realy doesnt matter you dont have to if u dont wanna)
we will need a host. so if anyones willing to host without stealing our server then well go ahead.
we will need a good source if anybody knows one because all the ones i have are crap. and we will need a dedicated team.
if you make the team i will pm you (most likely you will unless we are full) but like they say “the more the maryer”
ok im done and dont forget its for fun. we want to bring back good memories of mopar.
ps: we will also need a server name
